Miami_Gardens.Miami Auto Museum at the Dezer Collectio:
The Miami Auto Museum at the Dezer Collection is a privately owned museum in North Miami that exhibits automobiles and related memorabilia collected by Michael Dezer.
The Museum is housed in two large warehouse buildings, one for the Hollywood Collection, the other for the Classic Car Collection. The Hollywood Collection displays cars and vehicles used in movies or by the stars, among them a collection of James Bond cars and Batman cars.
